title: Two new awesome features
summary: Individual Linux Users and RabbitMQ AddOn.

title: API v3 is here
summary: Use the API directly from cURL with Personal Tokens

title: Announcing OS level security monitoring
summary: We are now actively monitoring your servers for OS security issues

title: Ubuntu 14.04, VPC support and T2 instance types
summary: Support for developer friendly T2 instances types are here, and more!

title: Say hello to your new dashboard
summary: Search, new navigation and many more improvements in the UI

title: Introducing ElasticAddress
summary: Build multi data center stacks in minutes

title: Introducing Custom Servers
summary: Fire up Custom Servers while benefiting from Cloud 66 management

title: Add your phone number to your account
summary: If you use two-factor authentication, add your phone number to avoid being locked out of your account

title: AWS Availability Zone Selection
summary: You can now select the Availability Zone of your servers on AWS

title: Per stack notifications
summary: Choose notifications for each stack. No more account wide alerts!

title: Better invoices
summary: Nominate a secondary email address to receive a PDF invoice

title: Tailing your logs with CX
summary: Tailing your logs is as easy as ever with CX!

title: Cloud 66 now supports Google Compute Engine
summary: Combine the power of Google's global infrastructure with the convenience of Cloud 66.

title: Updates to organizations
summary: A number of improvements to the way organizations work.

title: Set environments variables with CX
summary: Set your environment variables without having to redeploy.

title: New and improved toolbelt
summary: Faster and more powerful toolbelt is out.

title: Slack integration
summary: Receive Cloud 66 notifications right in your Slack stream.

title: Ruby 2.1.0 support
summary: We now support Ruby 2.1.0.

title: Introducing Cloud 66 ‘Organizations’
summary: Organize your stacks in Organizations and switch between them with ease.

title: Take full control of Nginx with CustomConfig
summary: Customize your Nginx configuration.

title: Database replication between stacks
summary: Replicate your database between different stacks, data centers and clouds.

title: Support for DigitalOcean Singapore datacenter
summary: Deploy your application to data centers across Asia.

title: Speeding up your deployments!
summary: You can now deploy your servers in parallel.
